relationships: [["ATOMS-Turkiye", "cloned", "IDT G-Blocks GadE gene into PSB1C3 vector"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "digested", "PSB1C3 vector and TnrA-pAlst-RFP G-Blocks with ECoRI and PstI restriction enzymes"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "ligated", "cut genes into the plasmid by using T4 DNA Ligase"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "transformed", "occurring products into BL21 competent cell strain"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "performed", "colony PCR with Verify Forward and Verify Reverse primers"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "made liquid cultures of", "not negative colonies"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "isolated DNA from", "these colonies after incubating for 16 hours"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "did cut-check with", "EcoRI and PstI enzymes"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "did a PCR experiment with", "CMV forward and SV40 reverse primers"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "questioned if the plasmid is incorrect because", "the results of PSB1C3 cloning weren’t matching with our expected results"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "cut the G-Block with", "BamHI and XhoI and ligated it with pET45-b which was cut with same enzymes"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "transformed", "ligated product into BL21 bacteria strain"],["ATOMS-Turkiye", "did a colony PCR with", "T7 Promoter reverse and T7 promoter forward"]]
